qa-2026-02-12-llm-config-lmstudio-mode-n.title: LM Studio mode appears not persisted by backend config
qa-2026-02-12-llm-config-lmstudio-mode-n.details: In compose-backed E2E, reloading Agent Panel after saving `llm_config.lmstudio_api_mode=completions` shows mode `chat` again. The test was narrowed to validate successful save flow; backend persistence behavior should be fixed separately.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-auth-fixture-sqlit.title: Auth fixture-state tests are skipped in compose-backed runs
qa-2026-02-12-compose-auth-fixture-sqlit.details: `auth-lockout`, `auth-rate-limit`, and `auth-password` skip when `ANANTA_E2E_USE_EXISTING=1` because they rely on sqlite fixture mutation helpers not valid for compose postgres setup.

qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.title: Compose-lite postgres logs report missing locale binary
qa-2026-02-12-compose-lite-postgres-loca.details: Postgres init logs include `sh: locale: not found` and `no usable system locales were found`; service remains healthy.

qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.title: Redis vm.overcommit_memory host warning
qa-2026-02-10-overcommit-warning.details: Hub/worker logs warn about host kernel setting `vm.overcommit_memory=0`; currently non-blocking for E2E.

qa-2026-02-12-agent-panel-config-empty-a.title: Agent panel config textarea stays empty after reload
qa-2026-02-12-agent-panel-config-empty-a.details: Playwright `llm-config.spec.ts` still fails because the config textarea contains no text after reloading the Agent Panel, even though `/config` returns an object with `lmstudio_api_mode": "completions"`. Investigate why `loadConfig` data never populates the textarea or the selector targets the wrong element.
